Including in subdir
 ===================
 
 .. absolute filename
 .. literalinclude:: /special/code.py
    :lines: 1
 
 .. relative filename
 .. literalinclude:: ../special/code.py
    :lines: 2
 
 Absolute :download:`/img.png` download.
 
 .. absolute image filename
 .. image:: /img.png
 
 .. absolute include filename
 .. include:: /test.inc
